nodes.text: The borer beetle was a type of insect native to Kashyyyk. Wookiee shields were often stylized with the telltale eyespots found on the backs of these creatures. In 1 ABY a spacer found a specimen of this species on the premises of the Dathomir Imperial Prison. It is unknown how it found its way there.
Borer beetles appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
